title: Hey Duggee - Jam Badge
cardDescription: The Jam Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 7 and has a jar of strawberry jam with a magenta round frame.
description: The Jam Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 7 and has a jar of strawberry jam with a magenta round frame.

content.content: Badge is worked as a spiral so no joining rounds until the outer edge.

content: (3 sc, inc, 2 sc) x6, at last sc pull through with SC [42]
slst, (inc with hdc, 6 hdc) x6, last hdc is made into the first slst, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.

content: with pink, ch 7, sc 2nd ch from hook, sc 5, turn

content.content: Fasten off and leave a tail for sewing.

content: with white, 8 sc into magic loop, slst

content.content: Fasten off and leave a tail for sewing.

content: with red, ch 3, sc to 2nd ch from hook, sc, turn

content.content: Fasten off and leave a tail for sewing.

content: Add few green bits on top of the strawberry.
Finally sew the whole jar to the badge.

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
